title: Backend Service Helm Chart Values
description: Schema for the backend-service Helm chart values.yaml

nameOverride.description: Override the name of the chart

fullnameOverride.description: Override the full name of the chart

auditVolumes.description: Cloud-agnostic audit log storage with blue-green migration support. Sets AUDIT_LOG_DIR env var based on target.

target.description: Specifies where audit logs should be written. Can be a volume key (e.g., 'blue') or a direct path (e.g., '/dev/stdout'). Sets AUDIT_LOG_DIR env var.

labelKey.description: Label key used on PV/PVC to identify the volume key.

volumes.description: Map of named audit storage volumes. Cloud provider is detected by presence of azure/aws/gcp field.

name.description: Explicit PV/PVC name. Defaults to {fullname}-audit-{key}. Useful for backward compatibility with existing volumes.

mountPath.description: Mount path for this volume. Defaults to /audit-{key}.

storageClassName.description: Kubernetes storage class name for PV/PVC.

azure.description: Azure Blob NFS storage configuration. Presence of this field enables Azure provider.

resourceGroup.description: Azure resource group containing the storage account

containerName.description: Azure blob container name. Defaults to release fullname.

clusterInternalServiceSuffix.description: Override the default '.svc.cluster.local' service address suffix

revisionHistoryLimit.description: Number of old ReplicaSets to retain

env.description: Environment variables as a flat map (creates internal ConfigMap)

envVars.description: Environment variables with Kubernetes native syntax

idleReplicaCount.description: Idle replica count for the ScaledObject

minReplicaCount.description: Min replica count for the ScaledObject

maxReplicaCount.description: Max replica count for the ScaledObject

triggers.description: Triggers for the ScaledObject, defined as a map for easier overlay configuration

type.description: Trigger type (e.g., rabbitmq, cron, prometheus, etc.)

metadata.description: Trigger metadata specific to the type

oneOf.description: Set to null to disable this trigger

extraEnvCM.description: List of existing ConfigMaps to be loaded

extraEnvSecrets.description: List of existing Secrets to be loaded

extraObjects.description: Additional Kubernetes objects to add to the manifest

extraRoutes.description: Additional gateway routes for the chart

annotations.description: Annotations to add to the route

labels.description: Labels to add to the route

filters.description: Filters to apply to matching requests

request.description: Maximum duration for a gateway to respond to an HTTP request

backendRequest.description: Timeout for an individual request from gateway to backend

cronJobs.description: Cron jobs to deploy alongside the main deployment

concurrencyPolicy.description: Concurrency policy for the cron job

env.description: Environment variables specific to this cron job

envVars.description: Environment variables with Kubernetes native syntax

failedJobsHistoryLimit.description: Number of failed jobs to keep in history

successfulJobsHistoryLimit.description: Number of successful jobs to keep in history

hooks.description: Hooks configuration. Define hooks as a map where each key is the hook name (e.g., 'migration', 'seed')

backoffLimit.description: Number of retries before the job is marked failed

name.description: Optional name for the container. Defaults to the hook name

command.description: Command to run for this hook

resources.description: Optional resource requirements for the hook job. If not set, will use the global resources configuration. Set to empty object {} to use no resource constraints.

initContainers.description: Init containers for the hook job

restartPolicy.description: Restart policy for the init container

volumeMounts.description: Volume mounts for the init container

networkPolicy.description: Network policy configuration for controlling traffic flow to and from pods

enabled.description: Enable or disable network policy creation

flavor.description: Network policy flavor - 'kubernetes' for standard NetworkPolicy or 'cilium' for CiliumNetworkPolicy

description.description: Description of the network policy (Cilium only)

enableDefaultDeny.description: Enable default deny for all traffic (Cilium only)

ingress.description: Enable default deny for ingress traffic

egress.description: Enable default deny for egress traffic

policyTypes.description: Policy types to apply (Ingress, Egress, or both)

labels.description: Additional labels to add to the network policy

ciliumPolicylabels.description: Labels to be applied to the network policy spec (Cilium only)

items.description: Label object for Cilium NetworkPolicy spec

annotations.description: Additional annotations to add to the network policy

priorityClassName.description: Priority class name for pod scheduling priority

metrics.description: Optional metrics port, does not default and is disabled when not set.

scraping.description: Controls ServiceMonitor/PodMonitor creation for metrics scraping

enabled.description: Enable ServiceMonitor/PodMonitor creation. Set to false if your service has no /metrics endpoint but you still want default alerts

for.description: Duration to wait before firing alerts

customRules.description: Override alert rules with custom values (for duration, severity, etc.)

^ArgoCD.*.description: Custom rule overrides for specific alerts

for.description: Duration to wait before firing alert
Duration to wait before firing alerts

disabled.description: Disable specific alerts by setting them to true

customRules.description: Override alert rules with custom values (for duration, severity, etc.)

^Kube.*.description: Custom rule overrides for specific alerts

for.description: Duration to wait before firing alert
Duration to wait before firing alerts

disabled.description: Disable specific alerts by setting them to true

customRules.description: Override alert rules with custom values (for duration, severity, etc.)

^Kubernetes.*.description: Custom rule overrides for specific alerts

for.description: Duration to wait before firing alert

additionalLabels.description: Additional labels to add to all default alerts

maxSurge.description: Maximum number of pods that can be created over the desired number

maxUnavailable.description: Maximum number of pods that can be unavailable during the update

timeout.description: Sets both request and backendRequest timeouts for all routes (GEP-2257). Can be overridden per-path.

secretProvider.description: Secret provider configuration for Azure Key Vault using VM Managed Identity. When enabled, tenantId, userAssignedIdentityID, and vaults are required.

tenantId.description: Azure tenant ID for the Key Vault (required when secretProvider is used)

userAssignedIdentityID.description: Client ID of the user-assigned managed identity (required when secretProvider is used)

vaults.description: Map of Key Vault names to environment variable mappings (required when secretProvider is used)

additionalProperties.description: Map of environment variable names to Key Vault secret names

terminationGracePeriodSeconds.description: Override the termination grace period seconds.

projectId.description: GCP project number for the workload identity pool

workloadIdentityPool.description: Name of the GCP workload identity pool

provider.description: Name of the workload identity pool provider

serviceAccountEmail.description: GCP service account email to impersonate

tokenExpirationSeconds.description: Expiration time in seconds for the projected service account token
